name: carList
description: Get a full list of cars

children.name: make
children.description: Deprecated: Not used anymore

children.name: model
children.description: Deprecated: Not used anymore

children.name: version
children.description: Deprecated: Not used anymore

children.name: chargetrip_version
children.description: Deprecated: Not used anymore

children.name: mode
children.description: Deprecated: Not used anymore

children.name: index_only
children.description: Old car that is no longer manufactured

children.name: production
children.description: Car is in production and has been released

children.name: concept
children.description: Future releases of a car, a concept of the car, specs may change over time

args.name: search
args.description: Search for cars by make, model, version and chargetrip version

children.name: availability
children.description:
Availability of car

Values:
   - 0 = Car no longer for sale in any market / region
   - 1 = Car currently for sale in at least one market / region
   - 2 = Car expected in market from Date_From (estimated), pre-order open
   - 3 = Car expected in market from Date_From (estimated), pre-order unkown or not open
   - 12 = Concept car, nearing production and/or confirmed, pre-order open
   - 13 = Concept car, nearing production and/or confirmed, pre-order unknown or not open
   - 22 = Concept car, not close to production and/or unconfirmed, pre-order open
   - 23 = Concept car, not close to production and/or unconfirmed, pre-order unknown
   - 91 = Status uncertain, introduction date and/or pricing unclear

args.name: size
args.description: Number of elements (count) to return, default: 10

children.name: make
children.description: Car manufacturer name

children.name: model
children.description: Car model name

children.name: version
children.description: Version, edition or submodel of car

children.name: edition
children.description: Another submodel level of car

children.name: chargetrip_version
children.description: Car model version. Added by Chargetrip as an alternative for when a car manufacturer does not provide an version name, or uses the same version name across all trims or consecutive years

children.name: standard
children.description: Plug type, known as connector standard in OCPI

children.name: CHADEMO
children.description: The connector type is CHAdeMO, DC

children.name: DOMESTIC_A
children.description: Standard/domestic household, type "A", NEMA 1-15, 2 pins

children.name: DOMESTIC_B
children.description: Standard/domestic household, type "B", NEMA 5-15, 3 pins

children.name: DOMESTIC_C
children.description: Standard/domestic household, type "C", CEE 7/17, 2 pins

children.name: DOMESTIC_D
children.description: Standard/domestic household, type "D", 3 pins

children.name: DOMESTIC_E
children.description: Standard/domestic household, type "E", CEE 7/5 3 pins

children.name: DOMESTIC_F
children.description: Standard/domestic household, type "F", CEE 7/4, Schuko, 3 pins

children.name: DOMESTIC_G
children.description: Standard/domestic household, type "G", BS 1363, Commonwealth, 3 pins

children.name: DOMESTIC_H
children.description: Standard/domestic household, type "H", SI-32, 3 pins

children.name: DOMESTIC_I
children.description: Standard/domestic household, type "I", AS 3112, 3 pins

children.name: DOMESTIC_J
children.description: Standard/domestic household, type "J", SEV 1011, 3 pins

children.name: DOMESTIC_K
children.description: Standard/domestic household, type "K", DS 60884-2-D1, 3 pins

children.name: DOMESTIC_L
children.description: Standard/domestic household, type "L", CEI 23-16-VII, 3 pins

children.name: DOMESTIC_M
children.description: Standard/Domestic household, type "M", BS 546, 3 pins

children.name: DOMESTIC_N
children.description: Standard/Domestic household, type "N", NBR 14136, 3 pins

children.name: DOMESTIC_O
children.description: Standard/Domestic household, type "O", TIS 166-2549, 3 pins

children.name: IEC_60309_2_single_16
children.description: IEC 60309-2 Industrial connector single phase 16 amperes (usually blue)

children.name: IEC_60309_2_three_16
children.description: IEC 60309-2 Industrial connector three phase 16 amperes (usually red)

children.name: IEC_60309_2_three_32
children.description: IEC 60309-2 Industrial connector three phase 32 amperes (usually red)

children.name: IEC_60309_2_three_64
children.description: IEC 60309-2 Industrial connector three phase 64 amperes (usually red)

children.name: IEC_62196_T1
children.description: IEC 62196 Type 1 "SAE J1772"

children.name: IEC_62196_T1_COMBO
children.description: Combo Type 1 based, DC

children.name: IEC_62196_T2
children.description: IEC 62196 Type 2 "Mennekes"

children.name: IEC_62196_T2_COMBO
children.description: Combo Type 2 based, DC

children.name: IEC_62196_T3A
children.description: IEC 62196 Type 3A

children.name: IEC_62196_T3C
children.description: IEC 62196 Type 3C "Scame"

children.name: PANTOGRAPH_BOTTOM_UP
children.description: On-board bottom-up-pantograph typically for bus charging

children.name: PANTOGRAPH_TOP_DOWN
children.description: Off-board top-down-pantograph typically for bus charging

children.name: TESLA_R
children.description: Tesla connector "Roadster"-type (round, 4 pins)

children.name: TESLA_S
children.description: Tesla connector "Model-S"-type (oval, 5 pins)

children.name: GB_T
children.description: The connector type is GB_T (Chinese standard), DC

children.name: CHAOJI
children.description: The ChaoJi connector. The new generation charging connector, harmonized between CHAdeMO and GB/T. DC.

children.description: The connector type is NEMA 5-20, 3 pins

children.description: Usable electric power in kW

children.description: Maximum electric power in kW

children.description: Charging speed in km/h

children.name: status
children.description:
Availability of car

Values:
   - 0 = Car no longer for sale in any market / region
   - 1 = Car currently for sale in at least one market / region
   - 2 = Car expected in market from Date_From (estimated), pre-order open
   - 3 = Car expected in market from Date_From (estimated), pre-order unkown or not open
   - 12 = Concept car, nearing production and/or confirmed, pre-order open
   - 13 = Concept car, nearing production and/or confirmed, pre-order unknown or not open
   - 22 = Concept car, not close to production and/or unconfirmed, pre-order open
   - 23 = Concept car, not close to production and/or unconfirmed, pre-order unknown
   - 91 = Status uncertain, introduction date and/or pricing unclear

children.name: chargetrip_range
children.description:
Is an index value of what we consider to be the real-world range.
(Comparable to Range_Real from EV Database.) It is essentially a normalized range to display in the front-end.

children.description: Best conditions are based on 23째C and no use of A/C

fields.description: ID provided by a car data source as the row ID
fields.deprecationReason: Will be removed in the future

fields.name: chargetripEdition
fields.description: Car model edition. Added by Chargetrip as an alternative for when a car manufacturer does not provide an edition name, or uses the same edition name across all trims or consecutive years

fields.name: chargetripRange
fields.description: Chargetrip's custom real world range provides a carefully calculated display range for all EV models. This is based on our own research and driving data
